name: A grand polished adamantite cuirass
data: It increases the users strength superbly.
It decreases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It increases the users wisdom ILLEGALLY.
It decreases the users intelligence adequately.
It has excellent armour class for its type (superb in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration phenomenally.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users physical resistance superbly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
